name: Alchemist's Raiment
flavor: To reshape the world piece by piece, thought by thought. All it takes is a little reshuffling of particles.

name: AOS#Al-Suhail
flavor: Crucible variant. Parallelized power systems ensure smooth response.

name: Apex Harmonic
flavor: Will is an arsenal, knowledge an armament. Each thought, a submunition.

name: Astrolord Robe
flavor: War is the struggle to exist. Everything real is a combatant.

name: Aura Purge
flavor: Breathe in. Breathe out.

name: Axiom Coven
flavor: Reach for the Light. In the instant of synapse, you will feel like a bridge to the world yet to come.

name: Azoth Bend
flavor: We did not create the Philosopher's Stone. It appeared to us in the skies over Mars.

name: Barkhan Dune
flavor: "Half-buried in the sand: a sealed canteen of greenish, ancient water. I drank it."

name: Bindcaster
flavor: "To bind another being, cell by cell, to your will." —Toland, the Shattered

name: Blindsight Vestments
flavor: "I shrouded myself so when the Light returned I could see it all the clearer." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Born Spark
flavor: Fabricated by your Ghost using nearby mass, this fieldweave handles life support and little else.

name: Chasm of Yuul
flavor: A clew of writhing things there was also, on that cusp between Light and Darkness.

name: Chroma Vow
flavor: Warlocks are expected to maintain ceremonial robes. We cannot cede the sartorial struggle to the Hunters.

name: Code Fire
flavor: Fieldweave armor guards the body with invisible layers of the Warlock's own Light.

name: Cormorant Line
flavor: The most valiant among the Praxic Warlocks are honored with the Cormorant Seal.

name: Cuirass of the Hezen Lords
flavor: "Slept in the armor last night. Woke to feel my heart stuttering to the pattern of an unknown signal."

name: Dead Light Wrap
flavor: "Success is not about survival. It is about discovery." —Arach Modesta

name: Deathsinger's Mantle
flavor: Fashioned from war prizes taken in Crota's hellish cosmos.

name: Desolate Robes
flavor: Take your new shape.

name: Dujiao Shou
flavor: "I believe every theory is true until it's proven otherwise. And sometimes even then." —Wen Jie

name: Dusk Tread
flavor: "To split knowledge open, to cure its skin, to bind books in its leather…"

name: Eclipse Maw
flavor: Applied ontology is the art of convincing things they shouldn't exist.

name: Elector's Robe
flavor: They will know you fight not for yourself, but for the people's will.

name: Enigma Burn
flavor: "To ignore the the City's peril is to sequester oneself from truth." - Pujari, The Transcripts

name: Extropy Morph
flavor: Observe the beauty of the highest symmetry: all reality unfolded from a single underlying law.

name: Haliaetus
flavor: Crucible variant. Fieldweave strands imbued with healing-protocol nanites.

name: Harrowed Chasm of Yuul
flavor: A clew of writhing things there was also, on that cusp between Light and Darkness.

name: Heart of the Praxic Fire
flavor: "In that last moment she seemed as wholly luminescent as the Sun, and I wished to be so brave."

name: Heliopause Robes
flavor: The Sun used to give us life. Now, staying near the Sun will be our doom.

name: Immanent War Robes
flavor: Conflict is the mother of reality.

name: Infinite Lines Robes
flavor: "I saw myself! Slaying the Darkness! That's what I saw!" —RECORD 344-CHASM-6872

name: Iron Breed Vestments
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Companion Vestments
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Regalia Vestments
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: ISTANU-GNT Razor
flavor: I am an ISTANU-GNT WEAVE INTEGUMENT, built as a vessel for your might.

name: Kallipolis Robes
flavor: The City's ruler must be a warrior as well as a philosopher.

name: Keeper's Cloak
flavor: "Be careful in the Prison, Guardian. The rewards are great, but your opponents are not the only ones being judged." —Ikora Rey

name: Kellbreaker's Cloak
flavor: Vengeance offers only lessons in suffering, but there is value in every lesson we learn.

name: Locus Watcher
flavor: The rich fabric conceals Jormungand-coil fieldweave, capable of dangerous power spikes.

name: Logic Singer
flavor: Well-crafted fieldweave armor is more than a defense. It binds the Warlock's will to the Light.

name: Manifold Seeker
flavor: The sawtooth plate houses a teleological Markov engine that operates on the Warlock's Light.

name: Monolith Bleed IV
flavor: "In a broken fortress at the heart of a poisoned land lies the wish-maker..."

name: Nemesis Plane
flavor: Most of the plating on a Warlock's equipment serves as an anchor and energy sink.

name: Nerigal Savant
flavor: Into the void, the spark. From the spark, the fire. After the fire, the void.

name: Pariah Robes
flavor: "I welcome every challenge, for it only makes me stronger." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Purifier Robes
flavor: "Fire is the breaking of bonds. Fire is freedom. We must be swift and thorough in our liberation."

name: Queen's Guard Robes
flavor: An Awoken relic from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Raven Sheath
flavor: The matter that makes up Warlock robes has been painstakingly adjusted down to the atomic level.

name: Robes of No Tomorrow
flavor: War is the struggle to exist. Everything real is a combatant.

name: Robes of the Exile
flavor: "Let the heat melt your body so your soul might flow with the river of time." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Robes of the Exodus
flavor: Humanity has been caged. We will break the bars.

name: Salicin Fen
flavor: "He lived his fourth life in the swamps of Venus, beneath the shade of a willow tree." —Five Lives of Albios

name: Samsara
flavor: "It is a lonely thing, to live forever." —Alemyr

name: Scalpel Wing
flavor: The greatest Warlocks understand how little they understand.

name: Seraph
flavor: "I'm not talking about our lives. I'm talking about what happened between the first one and the new one."

name: Shroud of the Justicar
flavor: The City is divided. We must unite beneath a single will.

name: Shroud of the Order
flavor: The City is divided. We must unite beneath a single will.

name: Solo Clade
flavor: From the ash, a slender sapling grows. Protect it.

name: Spektar (All Types)
flavor: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

name: Starfire Protocol
flavor: 13.4 billion years ago, the first stars kindled out of darkness, seeding the future of all life.

name: Symmetry Fang
flavor: Proud tournament livery, for the Warlock unafraid of challengers.

name: Talion Grace
flavor: "He passed out of my sight. But his power left a print in the air, like he'd bruised the world."

name: Tengu Operant
flavor: The vestments of an old gnostic order, sworn to search for an absolute that exists beyond symbols.

name: Terra Bide
flavor: I  won't abide by it.

name: Unity Clad
flavor: You are a lone power, and a part of something greater. A bright particle, and a rising wave.

name: Vanth Orcus 0A0X
flavor: Crucible variant. Massive inertial sinks anchor high-performance weave.

name: Vector Oath
flavor: The drab cloth conceals intricate fieldweave and layers of microscopic machinery.

name: Vestments of the Seven
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Viper Spine
flavor: There's a story about a serpent selling knowledge. The moral is: always be the serpent.

name: Voidfang Vestments
flavor: "YOU WILL DREAM OF TEETH AND NOTHING ELSE" —scratched behind a buckle

name: Watchers' Robe
flavor: "'Out of sight, out of mind,' they say. The Speaker wishes this was true." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Winged Sun Vestments
flavor: "Like a meteor burning until nothing is left but the idea of a Light." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Wrap of the Fatekiller
flavor: Humanity has been caged. We will break the bars.

name: Temporis Floe IV
flavor: Consider entropy. Some say the heat death of the universe will leave us with nothing but cold.

name: Raku Izumi IV
flavor: Crucible Variant. Modified by the Raku group to meet Lord Shaxx's rigorous standards.

name: High Command Robes
flavor: Power is not a gift. It is a calling.

name: Eon Tracer Robes
flavor: "Eternities streamed past me like shooting stars…" —RECORD-449-CHASM-6887

name: Endling Robes
flavor: We are the last of our species.

name: Red Miasma Robes
flavor: Well, SIVA requires no external power source, so…forever. ~SIVA.MEM.WB007

name: Iron Saga Vestments
flavor: Thus armed were the Iron Lords of old, in the days after the Collapse.

name: Hadron Gale IV
flavor: "A subatomic storm is all the more powerful when it is unobserved."

name: Days of Iron Raiment
flavor: "When we feared the sun would ne'er on heroes rise again, whose deeds began the new Days of Iron?" —The New-Forged Song

name: Cobra's Vigil Robes
flavor: "If you wish to learn the ways of war, look around you." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Robes of Triumph
flavor: Like a griffin's wings, the winds of victory carry you aloft.
